# Sleet Storm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (dust and water)

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Area:** Cylinder (40-ft. radius, 20 ft. high)

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 344

Driving sleet blocks all sight (even darkvision) within it and causes the ground in the area to be icy. A creature can walk within or through the area of sleet at half normal speed with a DC 10 [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] check. Failure means it canâ€™t move in that round, while failure by 5 or more means it falls (see the [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] skill for details).

The sleet extinguishes torches and small fires.
